personal_statement: Motivated computer science student passionate about building reliable and user-focused software. I enjoy solving real problems through code, experimenting with emerging technologies, and continuously improving my technical abilities. I aim to join a fast-paced tech environment where I can contribute, grow, and learn from experienced professionals.

experience.title: Software Development Intern
bullets: Assisted in developing API-driven services and optimizing backend data flows.
Contributed to UI features and bug fixes in a web-based internal system.
Collaborated in an agile team environment using GitHub for version control.

experience.title: AI Bootcamp Participant
bullets: Completed hands-on training covering machine learning pipelines and model evaluation.
Built small predictive models focusing on data preprocessing and validation techniques.

skills.libraries: Django, React, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Git, OpenCV, Pandas, TensorFlow
skills.other: Familiar with cloud deployment, RESTful APIs, and Agile workflows. Strong teamwork, communication, and problem-solving abilities.

bullets: Developed a computer vision model to detect crop types using image processing techniques.
Built a web dashboard where users can upload crop images and receive real-time classification results.
Designed and implemented a cross-platform mobile app using React and Firebase.
Enabled student authentication and event registration with push notification reminders.
Created a responsive portfolio site showcasing projects and technical skills.
Implemented reusable UI components and optimized performance for faster loading.
